name: Horizons Of Love!
description:
Welcome to Fenne Island! Where your New Horizons can be fulfilled! Whether it be romance or just wanting to have a change of scenery!

In Horizons of Love, you get the choice to date 4 characters, who will you choose? The big and strong Apollo? The laid-back relaxed Beau? The fashionable busy Raymond? or the pouty and design-savvy Marshal?

Horizons of Love is in no way in direct contact with Nintendo or Animal Crossing.
